mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vote (id, topic, choice1, scoreCh1) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4})
INSERT INTO vote (id, topic, choice1, choice2, scoreCh1, scoreCh2) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6})
INSERT INTO vote (id, topic, choice1, choice2, choice3, scoreCh1, scoreCh2, scoreCh3) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, #{param8})

INSERT INTO vote (id, topic, choice1, choice2, choice3, choice4, scoreCh1, scoreCh2, scoreCh3, scoreCh4) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, #{param8}, #{param9}, #{param10})

INSERT INTO vote (id, topic, choice1, choice2, choice3, choice4, choice5, scoreCh1, scoreCh2, scoreCh3, scoreCh4, scoreCh5) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, #{param8}, #{param9}, #{param10}, #{param11}, #{param12})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM vote ORDER BY idx DESC limit 1;
